sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"解决"之意。
means: solve ： 普通用词，含义广，指为有一定难度的问题找到满意的解法或答复。
resolve ： 主要指对问题或情况进行细微的分析或思索，以得出结论或解决途径。

sentence.Network_en: I dreamed up a plan to solve both problems at once.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想出了一个方案，可以同时解决两个问题。

sentence.Network_en: Human societies have the power to solve the problems confronting them.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类社会有能力解决面临的问题。

sentence.Network_en: Egypt wants to solve the problem in an atmosphere of cordiality.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃及想要友好地解决该问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'loosen, dissolve, untie'): from Latin solvere 'loosen, unfasten'

encyclopedia.content: 概述 solve是用来求代数方程的符号解析解。注意可能得到的只是部分的结果，并不是全部解。Matlab中的用法 solve(eq) solve(eq, var) solve(eq1, eq2, ..., eqn) g = solve(eq1, eq2, ..., eqn, var1, var2, ..., varn) 其中，eq代表一个符号表达式或字符串，var代表一个变量名称 详细的解释： g=solve(eq) 函数求代数方程的符号解析解。参量eq表示符号表达式或字符串。若eq是一符号表达式或一没有等号的字符串，则函数对方程的默

entry.def: If you solve a problem or a question, you find a solution or an answer to it.

example.ex: Their domestic reforms did nothing to solve the problem of unemployment...
example.tran: 他们的国内改革未能解决失业问题。

example.ex: We may now be able to get a much better idea of the true age of the universe, and solve one of the deepest questions of our origins.
example.tran: 现在，我们也许能够更加清楚地了解宇宙生成的年代，并且解答关于人类起源最为深奥的问题之一。

means.word_mean: 1. find the solution to (a problem or question) or understand the meaning of;

sentences.sentence: "Work out your problems with the boss"
"this unpleasant situation isn't going to work itself out"
"He could not work the math problem"

auth_sentence.content: It is not going to solve all the problems.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not going to solve all the problems.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not going to solve all the problems.

auth_sentence.content: Mastercard's interactive card aims to solve that issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mastercard's interactive card aims to solve that issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mastercard's interactive card aims to solve that issue.

auth_sentence.content: Ideologies don't solve problems: they create them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ideologies don't solve problems: they create them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ideologies don't solve problems: they create them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: solv溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→adj.可以解的,可以解决的
in无+solvent有偿债能力的→adj.无钱还债的
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+ency表名词→n.溶解力,还债能力
solv溶解,解决,松开+ent……的→adj.有偿债能力的 n.溶剂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 免除责任,宣布赦免罪过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab去掉,免除+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开→免罪
dis分开+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→松开分散→没有限制
re再+solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.决心;[使]分解,溶解;决议 n.解决;决心
solv溶解,解决,松开+e→v.解决,解答

Sentence.sentence: The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States.
Those who are good at solving practical problems.
Adopt a flexible approach to solving problems

sentences.en: He finally solved the difficulty of transportation.
sentences.cn: 他终于解决了运输的困难。

sentences.en: When will the police solve the crime?
The riddle couldn't be solved by the child.
sentences.cn: 这个谜语孩子猜不出来。

jushi.english: Perhaps time would solve the problem.
jushi.chinese: 或许时间会解决这个问题。

jushi.english: The clever child solved the riddle.
jushi.chinese: 这个聪明的小孩很快解开了这个谜。

jushi.english: He helped me to solve the math problem.
jushi.chinese: 他帮我解出了那道数学题。
